job_history.work_description: Designed and deployed the first data center the company owned, created cyber security policies and controls, and put together a team to support the data center and provide technical support for the new product offering. Demonstrated foresight in emerging technologies and leveraged technology to become more efficient and financially prudent.

Managed a project support team, supervised network administrators, and was responsible for all high-level network design and architecture for the organization. Evaluated security risks, ensuring HITECH/HIPAA protocol were followed.

Managed the overall management, infrastructure, and strategic planning of the National point of sale network at 100+ retail locations and 5 distribution centers. Managed the ERP solution at the manufacturing plant and the accounting and HR systems at the corporate office.

education.university: Mihaylo College of Business and Economics, California State University

skills.name: Data Center Management
skills.explanation: Designed and deployed the company's first data center, indicating expert-level mastery in data center management.

skills.name: Cyber Security
skills.explanation: Created cyber security policies and controls, demonstrating foresight in emerging technologies and expert-level proficiency in cyber security.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Put together a team to support the data center and provide technical support for the new product offering, indicating expert-level leadership and team management skills.

skills.name: Network Design and Architecture
skills.explanation: Responsible for all high-level network design and architecture for the organization, demonstrating expert-level mastery in network design and architecture.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed a project support team, indicating strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: ERP Solution Management
skills.explanation: Managed the ERP solution at the manufacturing plant, suggesting strong proficiency in ERP solution management.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Responsible for strategic planning of the National point of sale network, indicating strong proficiency in strategic planning.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Evaluated security risks, ensuring HITECH/HIPAA protocol were followed, suggesting strong proficiency in risk management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills by managing teams and projects, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Information Technology
skills.explanation: Master's degree in Information Technology and extensive experience in the field, indicating expert-level mastery in information technology.
